sentences.sContent: A new trade agreement is imminent.
sentences.sCn: 一项新的贸易协定即将签署。

phrases.pCn: 紧迫的威胁；逼近的威胁

remMethod.val: im(进入) + min(突出) + ent → 突进来 → 逼近的

words.tran: 迫切；急迫，危急；迫近的危险或祸患

trans.tranCn: 即将发生的， 逼近的
trans.tranOther: an event that is imminent, especially an unpleasant one, will happen very soon
